EmailTemplate.name: PHL_BRD_JMS_1708_August_NL.Email - NL
EmailTemplate.subject: Experience a Whiskey Wednesday with Jameson
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Having trouble viewing this email? View in Web Browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]>.
Finely balanced and blended to perfection, Jameson Irish Whiskey has been delighting drinkers with its smooth flavour for almost 200 years. Join us for an exclusive tasting experience at:
The Thirsty Barber
The Promenade
San Juan City
8pm Wednesday
6th September
Jameson Ambassador Kieran Crowe will be your tasting expert for the evening. Later on, there'll be a selection of tasty bar bites to savour along with a round of complimentary drinks!
If you thought it couldn't get any better, it can! Admission is FREE but places are limited so contact the Brand Ambassador kieran.crowe@pernod-ricard.com <[[mailto:kieran.crowe@pernod-ricard.com]]> or call 0917 853 7763 to reserve your spot.
Martell Cordon Bleu Intense Heat Dinner
Discover a New Experience at Chong Fatt
Jameson Promotions in September:
- Common Table Salcedo <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Salcedo+Village,+162+Valero,+Salcedo+Village,+Makati/]]> - Buy 1 Take 1 Jameson shots from 5pm-9pm daily - The Woodman's Head <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/5045+P.+Burgos,+Makati/]]> - 3 shots for PHP 300 - Bugsy's Bar & Bistro Alabang <[[https://www.google.com/maps/search/Westgate,+Commerce+Avenue+Cor.+Filinvest+Avenue,+Ayala+Alabang/]]> - Buy 1 Take 1 Jameson shots 5pm-9pm - Burgers & Brewskies <[[https://www.google.com/maps/search/Forbes+Town+Center,+Burgos+Circle,+Taguig/]]> - Buy 1 Take 1 Shots from 9pm onwards - Tap Station BGC <[[https://www.google.com/maps/search/Forbestown+Rd,+BGC/]]> - 1 free Jameson shot with every order of Craft Revolt Beer, Wednesdays 6-9pm
JAMESON SAMPLING During the month of September, you can sample a 700 ml bottle of Jameson and selected S&R supermarkets for PHP 999.95:
- S&R Congressional (QC) - S&R Commonwealth (QC) - S&R BGC (Taguig) - S&R Shaw (Mandaluyong) - S&R Aseana (Pasay) - S&R Alabang
